review: I like the way they deal with after service. Usually when an electronic item is sold, seller won't care the customer. review title: Good UPS; Almost invisible charging LEDs
review: I had purchased two of these, one back in 2022 for 899 and another in 2033 for 999. Both are working great and while on paper they claim 4hrs, in real life, i was getting around 2 - 2.5 hrs of backup with this.There was a difference in the form factor between the two purchases: The one from 2022 was a bit more compact compared to the 2023 version. Personally, I like the 2022 version better.A negative is that in both versions, the charging led is barely noticeable/ dosent exist. In the 2022 version, there is a green charging led but you need to look very closely to see it. In the 2023 version, it is not at all present. A properly visible charging LED would have been nice.

review title: False advertisement! Not a traditional UPS instead it's more of a use & throw chinese product!
review: -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------TL;DR: Not a UPS*, designed to be thrown in trash barely over it's warranty period! :(-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------# Ｃｏｎｔｅｘｔ• So, I bought this little over an year ago just to have some power backup from my router in case of a brown out which is eventually taken care by my society's power backup within 30 seconds. So, I had no heavy duty usecase for this product, but much needed during Zoom meetings while working from home.• In just ~12th month, I started noticing that my router used to reboot despite no power cut. It was quite strange but I ruled it out from some problem from Airtel's side.# Ｅｘｐｅｒｉｍｅｎｔ• Last month, this started happening multiple times a day, so just like any other scientist, I decided to run an experiment, to rule out if my router has gone bad, I disconnected this Oakter miniUPS and ran my router without any backup and it worked perfectly.• To make sure it's the Oakter's device at fault, I decided to deep charge it for whole night and then connected my router, but same result, inconsistent reboots.# Ｃｕｓｔｏｍｅｒ Ｓｕｐｐｏｒｔ• I decided to try my luck with the customer support service, but after taking a look at the invoice, they just shrugged and said "We can't help".• I didn't want to throw this in the trash and end in the landfill so I even asked if they can provide any battery replacements service since it's the clear case of battery degradation, but no help because ofcourse this just yet another rebranded chinese product meant to be thrown away once used.# Ｄｅｂｕｇｇｉｎｇ• Then, I decided to debug and understand why did the batteries deplete so quickly despite seldom use of ~30 seconds handful times in last 1 year as mentioned above. As you can observed in pictures attached, it's quite poorly soldered and taped together with the power board and the daughter board.• Upon inspecting with my multimeter, I observed an interesting thing. This is not built like traditional UPS which runs of the AC mains power while connected and only in the case of powercut, it quickly falls back to the battery backup (usually within ~5ms).• This Oakter MiniUPS product just keeps charging the battery 24/7 and powers the router via battery backup all the time, resulting in..., you guessed it, serious battery degradation once the battery can't provide suitable voltage to the router resulting in undervolting of router, leading to it's reboot.# Ｖｅｒｄｉｃｔ• It's a shame that Oakter promises to be an "Original Design Manufacturer" on their homepage and yet they can't design a sustainable and repairable product.• As an engineer I understand that the smart switch method like traditional UPS may drive up the cost or cut in your profit margins, but this product is just a cheap powerback with a soldered barrel port and some adapters.• I would expect the team to atleast think about refurbishing the product at some cost to save this device ending up in landfill in bulk once it's lifecycle is over. Swapping the unit ~50% of price might make good economic sense for both company and the customer.EDIT: Seems like their competitor - Cuzor is providing battery refurbishing services at some cost! A great initiative, what's stopping you - Oakter?

review title: Oakter Mini UPS - Excellent product but be cautious you can receive a defective one
review: Dear Amazon BuyersAfter carefully reviewing most of the reviews, Initially I was in a confusion whether to go for this product or not. One of my neighbour used Resonate where I found it as a good one as I physically verified.The rating for Oakter is below than resonate but Amazon offered this at Rs. 999/ which is half of resonate so I thought I will give a try. As usual based on some of the reviews, I received a defective product where I followed all instructions to charge it for 6 hrs. before first use but no use. It never charged by router. I think Lithium cells became dead. Thanks to Amazon for smooth customer support where I immediately reported and ordered for replacement within 7 days.  If you  missed to order the replacement within 7 days, then you would loose the money because there is no refund policy.I tested the backup of replacement one initially for 3 hrs. It was a smooth transition from power to backup mode without any  disruption in the internet. Then I really tested for full battery backup. It gave the power for 3.5 hrs (not as per the manual where it was told it will give backup for 4 hrs.). I do not have frequent power cut in my area but I am cautious about Monsoon coming in 2 months. I am satisfied with the product. Need to check how it will retain this backup period after 2 or 3 months. Also excited how log this product will have life as batteries usually wont last more than 3 years.I gave 4 rating because I have doubt on seller whether he purposely send a defective product and if people does not report within 7 day replacement policy, he could resist the replacement. This  has been reported by many buyers that they initially got a defective one but replacement was working fine.Also there is no refund policy to note. Hence be cautious on this.Otherwise thanks to seller for a very good deal on this ups.

This UPS for my router has literally saved my from countless embarrassing moments I would have been stuck in due to load shedding during online office meetings. My wi-fi router switches to back up within mili-seconds once the MSEB supply is gone. For me this product gives 2-2.5 hours of seamless power supply to my wi-fi router during power cuts. I will highly recommend using this UPS for your wi-fi router if you're working from home and need 24×7 uninterrupted broadband internet without having to worry about unexpected and annoying power cuts!
The product is good. Sometimes internet gets disconnected but not sure if the UPS is responsible for the same. However I find the product very helpful

The associates keep repeating the same sentence or copy paste the chat and dont provide solutions. Totally disappointed and waste of money. Never recommending anyone to buy their product.

review title: One of the most easy to install plug-n-play device I've seen
review: I got a call from the manufacturers to post a review about their product. However, it's not a paid review. Giving my genuine review.It was one of the most easy to install plug-n-play device I've seen in the recent time. Consumes very less space and has a good power backup. Purchased it due to frequent power issues at home during WFH meetings. It's a big relief. I have connected the router to the power backup that my society provides. However, it comes after a minute. So the router restarts 2 times in this flow. And with the boot time of the fiber routers, you know how much of a pain is it. This was a life saver device for me to solve this problem.Keywords:- Good Backup- Small & Easy Going with any 9v/12v routers- Installable by Amateurs (just connect the power adapter of the router to this device & from this device to your router and its done) - Manufacturers told me charge the device fully for first time use which I did not do. But it still is working fine for me. Just sharing information that I received.-

My apartment has a generator and whenever the power goes out, it restarts the router while switching to generator. Due to this, I’ll be kicked out of zoom and have to rejoin important meetings. This mini UPS was a perfect solution for me. It was recommended by my brother and I’m impressed about this product. It’s not bulky and at the same time holds enough charge even during power outage.I have never heard of this brand but I’m glad to know them now.

The product is easy to install..unfortunately my ups got faulty with in 5 months of purchase but the customer support is very active and helpful ( i spoke to Rubia from customer care). They replaced the faulty one with new with no extra charges. The resolution is quick and seamless.....thanks Oakter team

We really wanted a UPS for our router and had tried couple of them in the past only to disappoint us. We did not expect much when we gave Oakter UPS a try, however this one surprised us.It delivers what it promises. They have warranty as well. The Tech Support was also great and gave quick response to us when we wanted to clarify regarding the charging process. I hope this continues and they keep giving good service.
Good one

I am using this for my wifi router. Very easy to setup and started working as soon as i connected to the router. No issues till now. Pleasantly surprised to receive tech support details over phone and WhatsApp

I had bought 2 UPS based on recommendation from my colleague - 1 worked brilliantly but the other one was not switching on. I thought that I had lost my money as it was beyond Amazon’s return period. But great customer service from Oakter - they tried some troubleshooting but when it didn’t work, they immediately replaced the product. The replacement is working perfectly! Their service has got them a lifelong customer!

The customer service from Oakter is amazing. I have had a minor problem with the UPS and the Oakter CS has resolved it for me without any hassle. The 5 stars is for the good customer service provided.

I have being using ups since one month but due to some issues it's stopped working .I connected to the support team the response was very quick and good they are now helping me with the issue and replacing the product excellent after sales support

The UPS works perfectly fine and the service provided by Oakter is good.
I buy this product for my WiFi router and it's working fine. Backup at least 3-4 hrs without issue.Value for money.

I have bought oakter mini ups devices and they work really well. Extremely satisfied with the device. Gives almost 2-3 hours of backup. I have ordered a second one being satisfied with the first. Cheap and does its job. Bought it for Rs 800

review title: No interruption during critical online time
review: I went with this product for 2 reason(s):a)  Specifications were clear, product is compact and serve the requirementb)  Made in IndiaWi-Fi Internet at home is as critical as Electricity due to its usage.  If you don't have dedicated inverter UPS then you can plan to buy this product.

I have bought this a month ago, haven’t tested how many hours it can give me backup but this serves my purpose. Power cut in my are is only half an hour so this easily supports the wifi during that time. Have not face any such issues yet, there is no diff in wifi signal or connectivity as well.I’ll give this a 5 star because it is serving my purpose completely.

Good product.The only shortage I felt was a missing Power Adapter, doesn't matter if the cost is Rs.50/- more for the adaptor.Does have an extender but should have included a power adapter as this mini ups requires 6 hrs of charging before use.Except that, a good product for the price range, small, compact.Please make sure to charge the product for 6hrs prior to use.

The media could not be loaded.
                



 Very good product,value for money.

I have purchased this in August 2022. It was easy to install and gave backup for 2.5hrs in the start. But just after 3months the efficiency has reduced drastically. It is giving backup for only 15min.But the customer service is very good. I got a replacement immediately after contacting them. Now the new device is working fine.

review title: Perfect fit for TpLink WI-FI Router
review: Very quick 1 day delivery and easy to install, just connect and forget. No more issues with electricity fluctuations.The connector is having 2 pins which can connect any router. Mine was TpLink and it was connected with small pin.Did not test the complete discharge of the UPS but with usual 30min gaps there is no issue.Though the design and build is strong but not very classy so there is some improvement required in design with latest switch and smart leds with smart device status on Mobile App like Battery status and discharge rate along with alert which can make it an awesome device.

I had issues with the UPS that I purchased in Feb '2022. I reached out to the what's app support number and they have confidence that they will despatch a new UPS as this is within warrenty. Thanks for prompt customer support. I'll review the product after I receive the replacement
Amazon should help in proper way

review title: Great Product and awesome customer support
review: There were too many power fluctuations in my area due to which my router used to restart and thus hampering my meetings and work. So I bought this product and really liked it. It solved my problem. But After a couple of months it stopped working. But I am still giving 5 stars because of the awesome customer support team. I connected with them thru whatsapp and told them the problem. They asked for some photos and a video stating the problem and they replaced it within a week. It is really impressive.

From 2020 I was worked from home and using BB but when there was power cut net got blocked and problem start, I need to use mobile net but after hear about this product specially the price it surprised me. At thr start I dont believe weither it will work or not but I found this product is very much helpful.Thanks to creater.

review: I am getting around 4 hours back up. brought this mini UPS in October. After 4 months had some issues but oakter team ( Prashant) helped to resolve issue and arranged replacement of device asap. Really great customer service

I contacted the support team and after their initial diagnosis and my discussion with them, they explained me that the issue happened as I hadn't charged it for the recommended 6 hours before the first use. They also offered me a replacement for my device, which I will be receiving soon. The support team from Oakter, especially Prashanth and Aakash Tyagi were very prompt to resolve the issue and the entire process was hassle free.
Good for wifi router

Keep up the good job Oakter team 👍

review title: Review After 10 months of using the UPS
review: Writing this review after 10 months of using it. My society doesn’t have frequent power cuts or no power for long duration. I installed this Mini UPS to avoid interruption in online meetings due to common power cuts which would barely last for 2 minutes and backed up by DG immediately. So I haven’t been able to check if it actually lasts for 3-4 hours as mentioned but before writing this review I checked, I turned off the power supply of the UPS and it lasted for 40 minutes only. So anyone who has similar society conditions like me can buy but if you are looking for 3-4 hours of backup, I won’t recommend because it lasted for 40 minutes only when I tested.
I am currently using this mini ups and it is working fine for me. Happy with the product.

review title: Stay Connected with the Oakter Mini UPS
review: The Oakter Mini UPS is a fantastic product for anyone in need of a reliable power backup solution for their 12V WiFi router and broadband modem. I appreciate the inclusion of current surge and deep discharge protection, which helps to ensure the longevity of my devices. The easy-to-use interface and straightforward installation process make it a breeze to set up and use. Overall, I highly recommend the Oakter Mini UPS for anyone looking to protect their internet connection from power outages.

review title: Versatile and reliable for power fluctuations
review: Disclaimer: - The vendor provides a 6 month additional warranty on submitting a review. If you see so many reviews for this product, you now know why. Please note that buying from Amazon gives a 6 month warranty, and buying from the vendor's website gives a 1 year warranty.With the above disclaimer out of the way, here is my review on using this product for a few days. The reason for buying a UPS for the modem was to protect against the power fluctuations, milli-second drops and not for prolonged power outages.I have been using this MiniUPS for over a week and its performance has been excellent for the above use case. There has not been a single instance of the modem restarting due to power fluctuations. Setup is very straightforward and the accompanying booklet provides sufficient information. I have not tested for how long the battery lasts as that is not important for me.I have used the MiniUPS with the BSNL FFTH modem (Alphion AONT-100) and with the JioFiber modem/router and it has worked flawlessly with both of these devices.If I had to nit-pick it is on two counts - one, the led indicator is way too bright, and two, the accompanying wire is a bit short, should have been a bit longer.
Liked the product.👍

Seems it was possible to handle even more power down.There was no issue in wifi device signal strength and moreover easy installation. All instructions are provided with the box.I haven't used customer support yet but number is provide, not sure about support service.

Though my apartment has power backup and the frequency of power outages is low, still it takes few secs or sometimes half a min to get to the power backup supply. And again when the main power supply returns, it again turns off all the devices. Mostly the power outage happens when i am doing some critical work or watching a match or a movie. Having this UPS has made the experience too good and the wifi signal/connection is now always up and running as the router never turns off due to unextected outages. Its been more than a month and i have noticed no issues with this UPS.I would highly recommend purchasing this router UPS to have a smooth uninterrupted router connectivity. Company claims 4 hrs backup. Which should be sufficient for most of the users requirement.

review title: Faced an issue and it was resolved quickly by the support team
review: I had purchased the product in Jan 2022. However, I purchased the 12V one and not the 9V one. I never faced any issues with the router till now. In fact have been using it faultlessly during multiple power cuts (backup coming on and then backup switching off resulted in a switch on/off of WiFi router earlier) that I have faced between Jan end and May 2022.But today it stopped working when there was a power cut. As in the device doesn't behave like a UPS and the WiFi router switched off when there was a power cut. I connected with the number provided by Oakter over WhatsApp. Amazingly, the Oakter representative Prashanth Kotte really helped me with the issue. He said a 9V UPS would be better for me and placed a replacement order for a 9V one instead of this 12V UPS. Hope to get the 9V UPS in a week's time.

review title: Very prompt and good service, item is nice and useful
review: I purchased 2 nos at the same time and they behaved differently when connected , 1 gave a green glow from within the top cover,  the other did not. I attributed this to be a charging indication and thought the one that did not show the glow had the batteries fully charged at delivery itself. But even after 6 hrs of charging the glow remained on one unit . I tested the backup for about 10 minutes and both kept supplying my modems with sufficient power. I let the one with the glow kept on charging overnight and it did extinguish the glow. But it returned next day and this unit failed  just within 10 days of purchase. The other kept performing to my satisfaction . I reported this to oakter and the response was prompt and after checking through whatsapp a few tech details I was promised a replacement which did take place in about 5 days from my first contact with oakter and it was hastle free . Although the replacement has some trivial issues like the top cover coming off it is working alright. Over all the product meets my needs with the minor issues mentioned above (loose top cover in one unit and no glow iin the other) though it does show a lapse in QC of the product, but certainly the customer care has to be applauded for their prompt and useful service.Two months on wards: The same ups has gone dead  again, the battery is not gerring charged, probably dead short as the router power adaptor now cannot power up the router when connected through this mini  ups. Although the Oakter help desk team was ready to help out, I decided to discard the product as it certainly is poor in quality, failed completely twice (original and replacement) in a period of 3 months, so not reliable

review title: Broken product delivered, replaced and presto.. It works
review: This product has been delivered in broken condition and there is no return or replace option with the same.Updating this review after almost a month.  I had purchased their Mini UPS for WiFi router from Amazon. The first piece received was in broken condition since the packing was extremely flimsy. On receiving a call from the Oakter CC team and on informing them of the situation, they promptly said that they would replace the same immediately. The second piece dispatched was also received in broken condition.. The packing was again done very poorly and hence the courier delivered a broken piece. Again, the CC team called and I shared the situation with pictures of the same. The CC team was again very supportive and said that they will send another piece even though i said it was not required since I had repaired the 1st piece with tape and fevikwik. Aakash Tyagi from their CC team was extremely supportive and took my feedback on their packaging and delivery partner. Finally, the 3rd piece was received very well packaged and this time through Blue Dart who carried the shipment without wrecking it. 4 stars for their CC team and the product which by the way does it's job.. Gives a back up of close to 4 hours and seamless wifi experience even during power outages. Its a boon for WFH. Deducting one star for the packaging and delivery experience. Best wishes to the Oakter team.

Hi,I ha placed an order for two numbers of this Mini UPS. Thanks to Amazon delivery, it was delivered on the same day. On installing both, one worked, and the other did not. As per the instruction, I allowed it to get charged for over 12hrs, but no luck. It did not work. I raised a complaint with Amazon and Oakter support desk. The support team asked all basic questions even after stating your product is powering up!. They wanted the first photo of the router adapter with its rating. Later they asked about the video of the connection and product. That process took over 2hrs before the support team accepted them for replacement. The courier team collected the defective product the following day. But for the replacement to reach it took 5day! Felt bad about it. But finally, it worked. Happy with the support team of Oakter.

I bought the Oakter Mini UPS All-In-One for 5V / 9V / 12V WiFi Router UPS in Jun-2021 after looking at the reviews. While there is power backup at home, I wanted a mini-UPS for my wi-fi to support the switch-over time between DG and Mains. The product initially worked like a charm, seamlessly switching between AC and battery power enabling uninterrupted wi-fi. But just in November (5 months later), I noticed that the product had stopped working and everytime the supply switched between DG to Mains and back, my router would restart.When I called customer care, they immediately gathered the product details and invoice and I got a phone call offering either replacement or refund. But as I was using a 5V router and they only had a 12V option, they immediately agreed to a refund. Within a week, the product was picked up and after a few follow-ups, the amount was refunded.The 4-stars are for the excellent warranty policy and customer care services offered. They are quick to respond and transparent with the process.

review title: Best for places with frequent but short outages
review: 1. Best value for money product as the competitors seems to be priced near to 2k. I bought it around 1.1k which is a definite margin.2. The connection is too simple to make. They give you an adapeter cable as well which would fit an entire spectrum of wall warts which comes with normal modems.3. The company call for a routine check of your product which was when i detected an issue with the back up of my unit. Recently i noticed that my backup is only 30mins. At first i thought that these devices truly give that much only yet they claim few couple of hours in their advertisements. But the service engg said that is the issue with my particular unit and readily issued a replacement. Which i am yet to receive at the time of writing this review. But still i am quite happy with the way they dealt the issue. You know normally they don't admit these kinds of faults especially if it is on theirs side. A big shout out for oakter for being this customer friendly.So at the moment, i am waiting for the replacement to come. Maybe i will put a complete review in a week or two when i get the new unit.

review title: Works but only for less than 2 hours
review: I have been using this device for the last two weeks, and here is my review.Pros- Does the jobCons- Backup is less than 2 hours- The wifi router gets electricity supplied when the power backup button is on. When it's off, there is no supply to the router; ideally, it should bypass the current, which is how other products do, like curzor. The on/off button on power backup should only charge the device itself and not restrict the supply to the router.

review title: One of the best UPS at this price.
review: Ive been using this Inverter for 1 week and im writing this on the basis of that.It was so easy to install and after that i had some doubts regarding the charging and warranty.I contacted the manufacturers and they were responsive.Let me come to the Backup part.Ive been WFH and my other friends are using some other inverter and they bought it for 2k rs and what they said was they faced a small interval of time, whenever the power supply goes off,where the Wifi modem will turn off and turn on with the power of Inverter..so there will be a 40s of time without the wifi..But this one doesn't have any problem...It doesn't even glitch when the power goes off.It stays the same.No variations in supply and the Battery Back up is upto 4 hrs...Not more not less...U won't get more than 4 hrs...What i was looking for was continuos supply of current without any fluctuations and battery backup of 4hrs and i got it ...and for this price...Happy😊
Working very well, worth for the money spent

They are very responsive and had straight to the point discussion. Had gave them all the details like router, Adapter, Ups configuration details. They have validated and had placed replacement for the same. Would suggest to go for it.
Easy to setup.No lag if power is cut off.

Since my router is rated at 2Amps I am expected to get a backup of at least 3 hours.  Will check it’s endurance subsequently. I contacted the customer care and found them responsive.Only design recommendation to the manufacturer: add a feature in ups to give visual or audio indication when the battery drains out.I am happy with the product. Meets my expectations. Value for money.

review title: Made in India product. Using with Airtel/Nokia 12VDC 1.5A Wi-Fi Router. Worth 5 stars, go for it.
review: A very compact and true Mini UPS I have purchased on top of all other DC Power Backup solutions available in the market for Wi-Fi routers. Thank you, Oakter Team for the great product.I'm adding my review after using the Oakter All in One Mini UPS for 10 days. The product was delivered on 31st March... thank you, Amazon for the fast delivery.I'm using it with Nokia 12VDC 1.5A Wi-Fi Router for my Airtel broadband connection. So far it's working fine and providing an uninterrupted power supply. I need it only for a short period as I have power backup that turns on within a minute, however, the company claims 60-90 minutes backup. And, it can easily continue to run a wi-fi router for 60 plus minutes that I have tested with my Nokia 12v wi-fi router. I'll update my further experience after using it for a month.Thanks to two universal sockets that enable the option to connect two devices at a time if required.I also appreciate the outstanding customer support. The Oakter team contacted me to answer any questions and to check if I need any support related to the product. They have also confirmed Mini UPS can be left 24*7 to ensure an uninterrupted power supply to the connected appliances. Thank you, Aakash Tyagi for your outstanding customer support and for taking the time to call and address all my questions.I would recommend this Mini UPS to all those who are working from home, joining online classes, or online meetings and have a problem with power cuts, or those who are residing in an area with regular power fluctuations, like me.

Then I had to disconnect router and charge UPS for some time to resume operation. If battery is drained then UPS should provide power bypassing the battery and charge itself in the meantime.Once or twice in a day my wifi router restarts for no reason even when there is no power cut. So I assume there is some serious flaw with UPS circuit.Updates: the router backup time went to zero in 8 months. While it was still in warranty period I was able to get a replacement.

review title: Compact and pocket friendly impactful works for almost 3+ hrs. Suggested for WFH
review: Compact and pocket friendly impactful works for almost 3+ hrs. Suggested for WFHIn spite of mixed reviews, finally I bought this product of brand made in INDIA.Looks compact and pocket friendly carrying device that can fit in a palm.I was using it for my Jio router; initially it annoyed my router flashes red & green.After I realized that, I removed the connecter from router and kept it for full charge about to 3 to 4 hours, and then connected it to router. It works perfect fine.Per a few days of observation, if the router works continuously for 3 hours on power outage. After power restoration, you have to unplug the connecter from round and let it charge UPS for few mins and then connect ups connecter to router. This way it works perfectly for Jio routers.Did not see these kind of issues with my other Linksys router.
It didn’t last for more than an hour!!

review title: Now works with my Airtel modem
review: 25-Mar-2021 : My issue was resolved finally. It was a problem with my modem adapter. With a adapter provided by oakter, the issue got resolved.One noteworthy point : Generally, with any product, the customer does annoying follow ups. But in this case it is Oakter who did follow ups with me till they resolved my issue by sending a support engineer. Kudos to their Customer Support team. I change my rating now to 5 stars, mainly owing to their support..Read on below to understand my earlier issue. I had rated 1 star earlier..(28-Feb-2021) : My review is about Oakter Mini UPS ALL-IN-ONE, photo of which i have attached (i am specifying this because there are reviews on the same page for diffetent products). The Oakter Mini UPS ALL-IN-ONE doesn't work for my Airtel modem. I went for this one because i wanted single ups device for my modem and router (Aiterl Broadband has modem+router) and this unit has two power sockets to connect both.But when connected to this, my router starts but not my modem..Oakter support is prompt and they replaced the unit 3 times for me.. But all three units - same problem - not able to power the modem (12 v 1.5 amps) but router (12 v 0.5 amps) gets connected. Not sure of the problem, so i ask the qiestion.. it cant take the load of 1.5 amps modem?

review: Nice product to have in home

Charge it fully before plugging in your router for atleast 8-9 hours. When fully charged it will give back up for atleast 1.25 hours...tested till that long only. Earlier I got just 3-4 minutes back up and was very unhappy.  Customer care suggested this to do. Actually it recharges very slowly. Also my product had some issues, so it was replaced.  With new one I m not getting any issues as such. The only not so good part of this product is it charges very slowly..so the battery once consumed will take like ages to develop full back up while in use and may give impression of faulty product. Overall this is a must have product if you are wfh and hate getting dropped from meetings when power back up switches from one mode to another

The good thing about this product is that it is easy to install and has a good backup of 4hrs (approx). review title: A good made in india product
review: I suspect the product was sitting in the package for a long time maybe months before it was sent to me. The packaging (or some glue) was stuck to the wire as seen in pic. The packaging definitely needs to improve. It was not holding any backup power initially. Upon contacting their whatsapp support I was told it needs to be charged for 8 hours before first use. If that's the case I expect instructions in the package itself!Anyway , after charging it overnight,  it's working fine.It's a made in india product and that's the reason I bought it. Cost cutting is evident as they need to be competitive against other imports. I would say it is a good product, the packaging and delivery as evidenced by reading other reviews can be improved. The whatsapp support was an absolute delight as the agent (Zishan)was polite, quick and responsive to my queries.If the product fails within a year I will update this review !If not, I will buy more made in india products going forward.Update Sep 2022 -After using it for more than a year - device is working flawlessly and has given zero problems. Highly recommended.

I have been using this mini-ups for my home wi-fi router for the past 3 months now.1. The delivery and packaging was timely.2. It comes with a cable adaptor which can be used to pair it with most common home wi-fi routers/modem brands. If you have any questions about compatibility you can call the Customer Care number. They are super helpful and responsive.3. I use a TP link at home, and the installation took hardly a minute.4. Its very compact. So you can actually take it with you, if you are travelling.5. The build and cable quality can be a little better.I want to call out the customer support and after sales support here. Its one of the BEST I have seen from any company in recent times.Before purchasing the product, I wanted to clarify compatibility with my home device. The customer care was super helpful in clarifying this.Also, after the product arrived, during its installation, I needed some clarification. Again the customer-support team was very responsive and made sure all my doubts about the products operation was clarified.A shout out to the Oakter customer support team ! they are doing a very good job.Over all a good product, at the right price, with excellent after-sales support.

This mini UPS has backup of upto four hours. Works perfectly with 12v routers or any equipment that runs on 12v. I am using it with my Jiofibre router.It has good metallic casing. However I have few suggestions.One is after complete charge exhaustion of the UPS, the device connected, in my case JioFibre router, stops working, the led turns red.  In such situation the UPS must disconnect the power supply to the router. I take out the UPS and put it to charge separately before connecting the router again. Secondly, a blinking led might be incorporated to indicate the imminent charge exhaustion of the battery to save the connected device.Thirdly, the price is too high, under Rs.1000 is good.Overall a good product worth buying.

It's been two weeks now and the replacement unit is working fine hence upgrading the rating.The UPS has stopped working within a month. It is easy to use and looks sturdy from outside. However, have not been happy since the beginning. It did give power bkup however would take a split second to restore power bkup. And in this split second, the wifi router would restart, defeating the whole purpose to buy a UPS. Now after approx 4 weeks, the product has completely stopped working.

This is my second UPS from Oakter. I had the best experience with my first purchase. Second one has been a little difficult but I must say they have a fantastic support team. They have helped me get over the issues easily.
In less than one month, this product is dead. It just switched off, on its own, and now it is not switching on.

review title: Do the job, Using with Airtel-nokia router
review: Its a good to have.I am using only for short period as I have power backup which turns on within 5 mins.Problem I found during test run is if device is used for 15-20mins, it will consume so much current for charging that my router (Airtel-Nokia) will not turn on.Solution is to charge ups separatly and then connect back.Basically same output current from adapter is used by two devices, one UPS and Router. UPS has lower impedence and hence take out more current.Simple solution would be to add some circuit (that increases resistance and reduce current) to UPS.Build quality is also not very good, the plastic cover will easily open and you can see chargable AA batteries inside.
Easy to install, no need to charge for first time usage, light weight, works as expected
Its been almost 3 months.Product and back up is very good.

review title: Not compatible with Jio Router (ONT JCOW404 12V 2.5 Amp)
review: After reading the reviews and comparing with some of the most common and expensive brands like Resonate and dr com, I decided to order Okater mini ups. The device failed to work with Jio Router (ONT JCOW404 12V 2.5A) , despite the fact that Okater claims to support 12V 3A. I faced frequent disconnects (red light) on the Jio router . I checked with Jio technician when I complained regarding frequent network outage, and the technician confirmed that the fault is with the Okater mini ups. Without mainline power, it fails to provide enough capacity to the router and router turns red. I charged the ups over 8 hours multiple times and tested it for 2 days before returning the item. Luckily it had a return window (other brands do not offer return, but only replacement).

review title: Awesome mini ups specially who is working WFH
review: This awesome product who help me a lot as I am working with to have smooth and seamless attend my office meeting without interruptions or without fear of electric fluctuations in my society...earlier I was facing issue with router getting restarting when electric get fluctuated and switch to DG in my socient and my office meeting getting interrupted and hence impacted productivity and now with mini ups it ease my life in wfh ....thanks

review title: Doesn't work as intended & customer care is of NO help
review: The product by look seems very nice & easy to install, but unfortunately it does not solve the issue of power cuts because of which I have bough the product.What was hapenning - After I installed the product with my router eveything was correctly working but after a power cut when the power came back the blue light on the UPS started blinking & no power was delivered to the router till I manually restarted the UPS.This hapenned a few times, unfortunately even the customer care executive did not answer the query on the blinking blue light, even after multiple asks.The customer support asked my to separately charge the device, I am not sure what they mean, because it is a UPS not a power bank & any such instructions were not given on any manual. Furthermore no separate charging acessories were provided.I kept the device plugged on for 2 days, the issue never subsided. review title: Incorrect battery life mentioned for Oakter mini Ups for Router
review: So I got this UPS just now from Amazon, the product details mentioned in Amazon list average battery life of 4 hrs, whereas you can see the details on the back of box mentioning backup of 20 mins~2 hrs based on power consumption. Let's see how it fares. I will add additional reviews after this

The good thing about this product is that it is easy to install and has a good backup of 4hrs (approx). It will serve the purpose for those who don't have long period of power cut.The cons: Its an online ups i.e. continuous power is drawn from the battery, hence, if the battery is drain/dead, you can't use it; it needs charging.  One day it was good, the next day due to power cut i used it for 4hrs or more, it shutdown itself. Even when the power comes back it won't start up, I had to charge it for about half hour before resume using it.What i am looking for is a backup that switch to battery without shutting down the router during power cuts, and resume direct current when power comes back. I returned the product as it did not served my purpose.

I work for software services organization and in current covid-19 scenario I am working from home. This product is of immense value in the given scenario. I have a generator backup and during the changeover from power failure to genset back up, I used to loose the office calls due to no power to my broadband router. I came across this product after suffering several power failures during monsoon. Received it in well packaged condition. Very Easy to install. I haven't had any call breaks due to power failures since I started using Oakter Mini UPS for my home broadband router. Earlier there was always a fear of losing calls in wake of power failures. Now I can work with no such issues. I had an exceptional condition this month, where we had a power outage and genset had some issues at same time. It took about an hour and this Mini UPS supported my broadband router during entire 1 hour and I could continue office work without issues. Good product and served the purpose for which I bought.
The backup lasts for almost 3 hours. Useful product.

That being said , it has worked perfectly..though there are only very few power switches in my apartment(from line to backup supply 3-4 sec delay) but this doesn't let my router to go down and restart(airtel router generally takes a min to restart and then get back on network).. This is a nice additional to the WFH setup.

review title: Small and impactful works for almost 4 hrs. Must for WFH
review: This is a blessing for short term power cuts for WFH people.  Works seamlessly with our jio router and gives almost equal uploaded/download speed as tested on netspeed app with this mini ups and without it, worked for around 4 hours continuously..We had switched off the power adopter for more than 12 Hours (as we went away for the weekends) and then switched it on then it didn't work for some time after, but then we contacted the whatsapp no. review title: Definitely an awesome product at this Work from Home time
review: I'm always having frequent power failures at home, in the morning and the modem will trip and takes more than a minute to be back, even after having inverter.So by this interruption, the internet calls will be disconnected.With this product, I never faced a modem tripping while using for a month.The manufacture really saved my reputation. Thanks a lot.The product is definitely worth in the price I paid.Just 4 simple steps to install:1. Just connect the same modem adapter to this Oakter Mini UPS unit.2. Connect the inbuilt cable from the Oakter Mini UPS unit to the modem.3. Turn on the Oakter Mini UPS unit switch and the modem will be started.4. Turn on the power supply to the Oakter Mini UPS unit thru the modem adapter to charge the Oakter Mini UPS unit.That's it. All done...

review title: Compact choice for UPS with AC Input
review: The initial one that I got was a dud, didn't lit green and gave out a whining noise, got that replaced and it's been working good for the past 10 days.I'm using this to power a 12W WiFi router and a 24W PoE based CPE Device. The CPE Device doesn't accept DC input so I had to look for a UPS which accepts AC adapters. Shortlisted two options Artis 600 VA UPS and Oakter All in one UPS. Artis was cheaper by Rs.300 but a lot heavier and bulky compared to Oakter, so went with Oakter. My use case is to be able to support switch over to community generator so haven't had the need to test the backup time.

An excellent product and highly recommended in case you have to connect 2 devices.I have an airtel broadband connection which requires separate adaptor for Wifi router(netgear) and Modem (Ericsson) thus I was looking for a UPS with minimum 2 output option, the ‘Oakter mini UPS all in one’ fits my need and is an excellent product. The product features a 2000 mAh battery and gives a good backup, no lag observed during power failure and devices are running perfectly fine.Apart from the product the after sales service is far more impressive, I had some issue/ query with the product and contacted the support team; the response was quick and very friendly, not only the query got resolved but Oakter’s support team was continuously in touch and ensured speedy solution.
Tech support was good, they have regularly followed up post faulty device replacement. With good support and device performance, I will recommend to buy it.

The mini ups which I received was not giving power backup as it should give but when I reached out to Oakter on theri WhatsApp support, they immediately sent the replacement which is giving a good back up of up to 2 hrs.The product is easy to install and any router can be power with this. This is a must have product for those who are working from home, doing meetings and presentations online.Akash from Oakter team even called me to check if the complaint was resolved and I need any other help.

review: It is not a UPS to back up your Wi-fi for hours. It is a power bank for the router which can support uninterrupted supply to the router.I was looking for something which could support the minor power cuts in my society. It happened when the main power supply goes off and our Generator set starts working. It takes around 10 sec to 30 sec to get power back but it used to restart the router hence interrupted internet but now it is working fine after setting it up.Easy to install.I am using a 5G Nokia router given by Airtel broadbandPlease note that this review is after a use of 7 days.

The modem never went down due to seamleass power back up from the oakter UPS and it has really helped in focussing on the actual work than to worry about the internet fluctuations.

review title: UPS that does not beep during powercuts
review: It is a make in India product!!Installation can done in a jiffy - connect existing router power supply to the mini ups and connect mini ups to the router.It doesn't beep during power cut which is a major relief. Simple in-line UPS for a single 12V router. There is no power lag during power outages.Design is compact. It comes in black colour. Although white would have been ideal for my liking. It is ideal for mesh setup.In terms of utility, it is a major plus for online classes and WFH situations.

review title: A perfect compact, durable and reliable backup solution
review: Update: My AIO power supply stopped working, and when I contacted Oatker, they said that model has been discontinued. They offered to exchange my faulty unit with another mini ups for the same value. Pretty happy with their prompt response.Old review:Ordered this to power my Raspberry Pi 4, and it does that job perfectly while having a small size. The backup isn't exactly 60-90 minutes, and tends to last for 30-40 minutes (considering the pi barely sips on energy when it's not doing a lot of processing). For the price, it's a decent backup solution, has a metal build, and does the job.

Order placement - easyProduct R&D- read many negative reviews about the product not being sturdy, being light (in comparison to what!), and blah blah blah..... Try the product for yourself and as per me, there's no issues.Delivery - standard delivery time. I received before the expected datePackaging - wow. review title: Good modem power backup and remote
review: I have bought 2 backups for my setup. Good product with easy installation. It is giving me an uninterrupted internet now during power cuts / failover, I haven’t tested for more than 20 mins as my society gets the power backup within 1 min. Only issue I have faced is with the unsupported pin for my optical Fiber modem, but product pin supported perfectly for my wifi modem. Product comes only with 2 types of pin, not sure whether my optical Fiber modem has an uncommon pin socket. I had to take an old power adapter pin and solder to extender which is provided within the product. I have recommended this product to others in my society.

got this product in the month of October.  the product worked well giving 4 hours backup to Nokia Modem (airtel) without main power however did not boot up after that.  I had to recharge it offline and then start again.  I wrote to customer support they helped with my queries and shipped a new 5 V adapter.  (earlier it was an original modem 2 V adapter was in use).The UPS is now working as desired, even after it is completely drained, post main power restores it works with intervention.  getting good up to 4 hours of backup time.  thanks a lot to the entire team for such a nice product.
The device suffices the WFH purpose. The backup is coming for 3.5 hours. Didn’t face any signal drop or fluctuations as of now.
It help to give you backup on power cut for Wi-Fi and support of the product is great

review title: Good overall experience with great service
review: I have purchased this product 3 months back. It stopped working suddenly. I have approached the service team. They have responded immediately and replaced the product in 3 days. Overall good performance. Getting back up for 4 hours for my Airtel xtreme fiber router.

review title: Useful device for router backup purpose
review: Oakter MiniUPS is really useful when you need backup for your WIFI router. It's a must decide for those who are doing WFH to avoid sudden disconnect from meetings or calls during unexpected power outages.

It's very easy to install the UPS and surely it's made my my life a lot easier. Especially considering wfh. The batter backup is a also good, I was able to test it when our light went off for 2-3 hours. Goody buy!

review title: A good, nor reliable wifi modem back up Ups
review: It's a must have device for your wifi modem. In case of power failure, even though I have 24 hr generator back for my home, you internet connection used to get interrupted. It was annoying to get disconnected while in middle of something online, like webinar or meeting. This mini ups has made life easy. It gives enough power for wifi modem to be online all the time.Built is good. Very light weight. Gives power for my modem for about 45 minutes. It doesn't heat even on power failure or while charging. Package contains, two three types of adapter for using with different types of modems.I will recommend to those who want to have a power back up for their wifi modem.

Product was good . I have some issues with backup after using it for few months but the OAKTER team replaced it very smoothly.Now it's is giving me more than 2 hours of backup.Best product so far...value for money product. Great superb love it .

review: Easy to install and has small size can be easy hide behind the router. I am using it with Nokia router comes with Airtel Broadband, Backup is good around 3-4 Hrs. But has one problem after draining all power during power failure as the power comes back it consumes all current from the power supply and doesn’t supply power to router. Router doesn’t work, it’s recommended to charge Backup machine separately.

review title: Ok for low consumption routers not Jio
review: Installation is simple, product build is also good. But, battery is small, if you are using low power consumption routers its good. I used it for jio which takes 2A, got about 20-25 minutes of backup without any interrupted WiFi signal even after loss of power. Go for it if you have a generator which takes some time to start after power is cutoff. Because it can provide that backup.
Superb....

However this product was disappointing because of backup time it provides hardly 10 minutes on my Airtel Router ( Binatone DT910W).Review after 2 months :Router started to restart frequently couldn't figure out what was happening.  Then noticed this product fluctuating , and not supporting output power , avoid this product at all costs.

review title: Very good product. Works as intended. Replaced my bulk UPS
review: I used this product for my Wifi router. It replaced an old Lead Acid battery bulk UPS which did not give me more than 5 minutes of backup. This gives me around 2 to 3 hours. I even forget to keep it back on as it works too good. Definitely recommended for wifi routers.  The only flaw I saw immediately is that it does not have an alarm as I sometimes forget that is on backup.  I am not sure about long term review though. Hope it lasts long. I am looking forward to buy one for my camera ssytem.

review title: Wonderful and must buy product. Really helped me.
review: I purchased this due to frequent power outage issue. This really save my life. Received on same day with good packing and in new condition. Its very easy to install, anyone can do that in 2-3 mins.

review title: Awesome UPS for wifi router or Fiber router
review: Works as described without any disruption during a failure, must have for your home wifi or fiber modems.

Installed it about 5 days ago and has stopped working already. This UPS automatically stops providing power to the wifi router at odd times even when the power supply is on. At my place, the power supply was down only once for 2 mins withing period of 5 long days so there is no possibility that UPS was not charged. I think this product does exactly opposite to what it is supposed to do. It does not power the router when the electricity is on. :)On top of that, Amazon does not provide a refund for this faulty product. Refrain from ordering and go for more reliable options even if expensive. If you buy this, you'll have to live with it. It's practically useless.

review title: Excellent Product and Prompt after sales support from Oakter
review: I bought this product end of Feb 2021. Its only few days to expire the one year warranty. My UPS stopped generating enough power for my Jio router.  Ashish Kumar from Oakter after sales support helped me to get replacement. All this happened with in one hour..! Excellent product..! Very good After sales support...! Go for it without a doubt.

review title: A small hiccup but good product!
review: The one I received from Amazon was not working the way it should and I was disappointed but man, what an excellent customer service does Oakter have. They almost instantaneously arranged for a replacement and it just simply works.One important thing that I'd like to mention is, please charge the new device you get for about 6 hours before the first use in order to see the optimum result.In case you receive a dud like me, fret not and just contact the customer care. They're very helpful.

review title: Very cooperative after sales service team.
review: Very easy to install
Quality is not good. Switch is loose but somehow working.

Jio router light started turning red once in a while after fitting this device. Gets back to green after switching the device off and then on again (first red and then green after 2-3 minutes). Happens twice or thrice in a day. Without the device the router stays green all the time. Cannot figure out where the problem is, but as per a few days of observation, the jio router seems to perform inconsistently when plugged into this device. Jio engineer says that router is ok if it is turning green.Updated:Got a replacement and the issue stated above became less intermittent ( not a daily issue ).But then it finally stopped working after about 5 months. The router red light keeps blinking when connected to this device. The router works fine when the device is not connected.

Very nice product working properly 4.5 hrs backup with MI router. Before buy please note your ISP internet service provider firber line should be active internet connection even if area power down. If they use tredional switchs in your area they require power backup if power goen that will not work . Please confirm first and buy .

review title: Live up to what it's supposed to do
review: the first day when I installed it, I forgot to turn on the main power switch and my wifi kept working on it for uninterrupted 4 hours.only when the wifi signal went down I realised that, main power is off. This mistake turned out to be a really good testing on first day of installing the product.Installation is easydon't heat uptakes very less spaceCons:the only issue I found was the power switch in UPS seems a bit fragile, but I immediately put the Heat shrink on it to give it some sturdiness.Rest all is good. A really good buy in this price range.

Awesome product and great customer support, after few months, I was facing issue with battery backup, but this issue was quickly resolved by Zishan from oaktar support team, and he has arranged a replacement for the product.

.After purchasing, I charged it whole night and then used it without connecting to power. It lasted almost 4 hours. I am satisfied with the product. Customer care was supportive and quick to respond in WhatsApp.

It was very easy to install and start using. It has got a steel body, which makes it look very neat and it's very sleek too. WiFi signal broadcast is not that great, but still good. Probably the price of the item could have been little lesser, as it definitely has some areas, where it could have been better and improved.
I have been using it from past 6-7 months and I did not face any issues so far. 1 hour is the minimum which I was able to test but for sure the back up would be around 3-4 hours.

review title: Nice product best unclass n does the purpose of the ups for modem for good 2-3 hours
review: Real Easy to install and use Amazing product works as expected with decent backup customer service is out of this world truly  amazing keep up the good work u guys been doing

I got this product for my router to have a uninterrupted internet supply during my online meetings.  Unfortunately this has not happened.. Everytime there is a power cut, I could see a lag of some micro seconds by the UPS while switching from power supply to battery.. this makes my Airtel modem to restart which again takes 40sec to 1 min for the internet to be back. The overall time it takes to get the internet back online from the point of power cut is about 1.2 - 1.5 min. And this gap/offline time does matter when you are in between an important meeting. So this product doesn't solve my problem of uninterrupted power supply. I have returned the product and ordered another one from different brand.. Can't comment on the power back up since I have removed the UPS and returned it immediately. P.S As instructed I have recharged the UPS for almost 8 Hrs before I plug it to my router.  I would not recommend this product if you are looking for 0 interruption. It will definitely make your modem to re-start.

review title: Fluctuates when connected to JIO router
review: After couple of months started having issues when connected with Jio router.  Signal started turning red once in a while and gets back to green after switching the device off and then on again. Happens twice or thrice in a day. Without the device the router stays green all the time. Cannot figure out where the problem is, but as per a few days of observation, the jio router seems to perform inconsistently when plugged into this device. The router works fine when the device is not connected. Read a similar issue faced by another user in the reviews.

The UPS was bought for our WiFi extender. It was the only one with sockets. The only drawback is the size. The backup is sufficient for close to 2 hours. Tried and tested. The finish of the product could have been better for the price.

review title: Back up time of the ups
review: I initially had only back up for 10 min. In talking to oakter contact as per their website, I was told to charge the ups without connected to modem over night. Then I found the back up was working for two hours when I tested. I am told initially, it should be charged without modem for 8 to 9 hrs.

review title: Cheap bad quality product. Do not buy!
review: It worked fine for 2 weeks. But after that, it started giving issues. It was not charging properly even after charging it for 2 hours as per the customer support. Performance/ quality is not up to par. Had to return it.Update - I charged the ups for the entire night without connecting it to the router and it started working the next day. So, am still using it. Will update again after a few months of use.Last update - Battery backup is pathetic. It supported for a 2 hour power outage. Once the power came, it worked for another hour with the mains connected and then started blinking.. which means even 1 hour of charging, after a back up of 2 hours, was not enough for the UPS to charge itself and provide enough for the wifi to work. So, basically it does not do its job, what's the point of giving a back up if the UPS discharges within an hour of power restoration?? Its a bad quality product. Please dont buy this cheap thing, there are other well known brands of UPS - little more expensive - which i believe will perform better than this piece of crap! Go for a quality product, and don't repeat the mistake i made. My return window is closed now, so i have to buy another UPS and the money spent on this crap is completely wasted!

review title: Worst Product I have ever seen

They checked and initiated a replacement of the product. They picked the product and delivered a new one on 4th of April 2022. The new one which I received is a dead product which dont work. I raised it again to Oakter and now they are saying another replacement will be provided, as I was fed up of this Product I requested for a Refund & now they are telling me to reach out to Amazon for the refund. The policy for the return in amazon is 30 days. I lost money, product is not good and I do not recommend anyone to purchase this product. The support team is also not helpful. I suggest to go for other good Brands rather chosing Oakter.

review title: Strange feature of not charging while modem is using power.
review: From the description and all it seemed like a powerbank for your 12v router/modem. But it works weirdly, it came with some charge of a couple hours. But once that charge ran out during power outages, it started dying out within a second or two after the power cuts. And it seems charging it while it powers the device is not something built into it.Unfortunate, because if it did charge faster than the backed up device's consumption, it would be ideal, since it's a nice design and minimalist features overall. But legit upset about the whole insufficient charging power issue. Whatever the cause of it may be.

This is a great product. Using it to support all the WiFi routers and extenders at home. Been using 6 of them for the last few months. Worthy investment. The best part is, it doesn't get heated up. Thanks for a great design

review title: Not working in less than a month

It did not work.While i left it charging overnight, I had connected it to WattMeter to check if it was charging the battery, but the consumption was less than 1W indicating it was probably not charging the battery or the battery was full and it was not drawing any power.In any case defective product and i have ordered a replacement. Let's hope the replacement works as advertised.

review title: Did not work with my Netgear Orbi RBK 43 Router
review: Just did not work as advertised. I connected it and the LED started blinking. I removed the power output of UPS router and waited for about 6 hours to get it charged and then connected it to router.  Even while input AC power was present the LED started blinked and router went off. Just did not work as advertised.  I was sent a replacement UPS because this one was not working. The replacement UPS was worse than what was delivered for the first time. The replacement unit was either a refurbished one or was damaged. The contents of the UPS were coming out of the enclosure!!! What a horrible service.  Finally returned and in the process of getting a refund. I tried another product which did not work either. I don't believe there is a good product out there for this purpose.
Like it.

Very active and satisfied after sales services too. Good Value fork money along with very cooperative staf with transparent feedback which can be done or can not be done. Mini UPS is providing sustainable service along with good customer support.

I placed the order for it on Jan 10 and it arrived Jan 15. The seller gave only a 15 day window to return it. And I am unable to figure out how to contact the seller for a replacement.

I am just waiting for the past one week, no replacement sent..  Not sure whether battery in UPS is bad or it is not compatiable with Airtel 777VR1 router.. Really frustrating..

review title: Ran out of juice in less than a year
review: Bought the device in December 2020, and from August this year(2021), it has been giving backup of less than an hour. The tag of nationalism in Make in India is great, but only when the product actually lives to the quality. This one doesn't, as it Ina short lifespan wore away more like a Chinese product.
